thread.title: Check Who Called Launches $10,000 Prize Giveaway with the Release of New Logo
thread.title_full: Check Who Called Launches $10,000 Prize Giveaway with the Release of New Logo - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Check Who Called Launches $10,000 Prize Giveaway with the Release of New Logo
text:
With the release of a new logo, leading reverse phone lookup website, Check Who Called, is launching a $10,000 in prizes giveaway
Toronto, ON
Legend’s Gate Media announced a $10,000 in prizes giveaway to coincide with the introduction of a new logo for its leading reverse phone lookup website Check Who Called. The unique, new, and easy to identify logo features a phone inside a magnifying glass with a question mark.
“The new logo better communicates what Check Who Called is,” said Legend’s Gate Media President Scott Rezka. “With more mobile visitors, the addition of the image of a phone inside a magnifying glass with a question mark can be used to easily identify Check Who Called on smaller devices or apps.”
The new logo was chosen by running a design contest. The contest ended with over 650 entries from logo designers all over the world. Legend's Gate Media decided on a crowdsourced design because of the wide variety of logos that would be submitted. "It is great to have many options to choose from. When we picked the new logo, we worked with the designer one-on-one to make it exactly what we wanted," said Scott.
The "New Logo $10,000 in Prizes Giveaway" runs until December 31, 2015 and is open to residents of the United States and Canada. An email address is required to enter. The prizes for the giveaway include:
25 x $100 gift cards, 50 x $50 gift cards, and 250 x $20 gift cards from companies such as Amazon, Best Buy, Target, Home Depot, Gamestop, Staples, Gentlemen’s Post, iHop, Golfsmith, and more. 100 Check Who Called T-Shirts 2000 Check Who Called Fridge Magnets
About Legend’s Gate Media
Legend’s Gate Media is an online media company that buys, enhances and creates new websites. Check Who Called® is a leading community supported reverse phone lookup website with over 3 million visitors per month. For more information about Legend’s Gate Media or Check Who Called®, visit: LegendsGateMedia.com and CheckWhoCalled.com
